shortBio:
Hi! I'm Andrea, a **game programmer** from Milan, Italy, and I've been passionate about games since I was 5.
I've always wanted to be part of this world, creating amazing, unique, and life-changing experiences!

After earning a degree in Computer Science and working as a Software Developer and then as a Project Lead Developer, the time to pursue my life's goal has finally come! As Professor Oak always says, “There's a time and place for everything!”

I started learning Unreal Engine in late 2023, after spending some time with Godot and GDScript.

During my previous work experience, I had the chance to refine my skills in C++, C#, and Python, while improving my soft skills by collaborating with different teams in an Agile environment allowing me to learn various Scrum tools and practices.

Feel free to look around! On this site, you'll find some projects I've worked on. I hope you enjoy them as much as I enjoyed working on them!

If you find my profile interesting and want to know more about me — or simply because you've read this far — I would love to get in touch with you, so feel free to contact me in any way you prefer!

And as always, keep gaming!
skills: Languages: C++, Python, C#, GDScript, Javascript
